Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Gabrielle Pace
Reviews.Content: I honestly expected the worst, but I was pleasantly surprised. I ordered the phone on a Thursday and it arrived Monday morning so kudos for the fast shipping. This was my first experience buying a phone online. The phone was listed as in very good working condition and I do agree. There are several minor scratches on the front and back but they're light and 3 or 4 at the most. However, I was disappointed that it was not listed that the phone didn't come with a SIM card. I'm not sure if that's common knowledge or not, but for those of you who are unaware. I ended up going to Sprint who sent me on a wild goose chase to get one from Apple. Apparently, a SIM card is something you should receive from your phone carrier. Again, for those who do not know. But so far, I am satisfied with this product and the seller.

Reviews.Title: What I Needed!
Reviews.Author: John Jaramillo
Reviews.Content: All I can say, that the 32GB memory is just what I need for pics, music, movies, and apps!  Just awesome!

Reviews.Title: Like brand new!
Reviews.Author: Selita
Reviews.Content: The phone came in great condition; it came just as described but better. I had a couple problems ordering other iPhones on Amazon but I ordered this one and couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: Great buy, just what I expected.
Reviews.Author: FreddyGee
Reviews.Content: I was looking for IPhone 4 and I got a good deal with this buy. Excellent phone. Got it late, but was worth it.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Raw Foodie
Reviews.Content: I had a problem with my phone when I received it.  I contacted the seller and they called me within 30 minutes and made everything right.  I couldn't be happier and the phone works beautifully.

Reviews.Title: Exactly like a new unit
Reviews.Author: Dye Junior
Reviews.Content: This might as well have been a brand-new iPhone. It was in perfect condition and came in the same packaging with the same accessories as a new unit. Bought for my wife to use with Ting and we'll be in the black versus a contract plan in under 6 months.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful purchase
Reviews.Author: Belle Poppenberger
Reviews.Content: This phone shipped quickly, was in excellent shape and works perfectly.  The only reason for being one star short is that the MSID number on the box and the one on the phone were different.  This caused a huge problem with activation, but the seller was very helpful when I called him.  If we had not used the code off of the box it would never have been a problem!
